titles: Elegie on the universaly [sic] lamented death of Mr. Alexander Scheills: an eminent minister of the gospell, who departed this life at Jamaica, in his return from Caledonia, 1700.
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Elegiac poetry, English --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
